title: A Bridge of friendship
brief_description: The 6th Boy Scout Jamboree held at Lansdowne, Sydney, 1960-1961, from the initial planning to the closing ceremony. Scouts from all over the world came for fifteen days, rigging tents, cooking, exchanging badges, singing around the campfire. Shows the march through Sydney and the visits of the Governor-General and other notable people.
